thread.title: 'I can't claim to be an orphan because of you'- Pearl Thusi thanks Basetsana Kumalo
thread.title_full: 'I can't claim to be an orphan because of you'- Pearl Thusi thanks Basetsana Kumalo

title: 'I can't claim to be an orphan because of you'- Pearl Thusi thanks Basetsana Kumalo
text:
In memes: How Date My Family's 'Ghetto snob' Lerato slayed the internet 
Pearl who is currently living in the States, where she is filming for drama series Quantico, got emotional, after a visit from Bassie. 
In a heartfelt social media post, Pearl told fans how Bassie has helped her grow into a woman. In memes: How Date My Family's 'Ghetto snob' Lerato slayed the internet 
"She gave me my first laptop. Helped me bury my grandmother. Held my hand as I became a mother. Taught me lessons about being a lady. Scolded me when I faltered," Pearl wrote. 
The actress described Bassie as an angel, who was sent by her late mom to take care of her. 
"I can't claim to have been a motherless orphan because of women like you," she added. Feb 12, 2017 at 2:01am PST
